      • beginSelfEvolution

        public Solution beginSelfEvolution()
        population initialization fitness computation while (termination condition) parent selection crossover with probability pC mutation with probability pM Infeasible Individuals FIX Dynamic Local Search (Simulated Annealing / Tabu Search) natural selection update best solution return best
        Returns:
        best found solution

        Returns:

      • initPopulation

        private void initPopulation()
        Initializes population by inserting maxPopulation Solutions generated randomly and initializes also the best Solution with the first feasible Solution found. COST: O(maxPopulation*numExams)

      • crossover

        private Solution crossover(Solution parent1,
                           Solution parent2)
        implements uniform crossover for each exam to assign into the new spring flip coin if(gene of parent1 is feasible and gene of parent2 is feasible) then if head take gene from parent1 else take gene from parent2 else take the feasible gene
        Parameters:
        parent1 - first parent
        parent2 - second parent
        Returns:
        new spring for the population

        private void naturalSelection(java.util.List<Solution> children,
                              int n)
        Deletes n Solutions from population and adds n children to the population. kill criterion: kill n worst solutions
        Parameters:
        children - the list of children
        n - number of solutions to kill from the population
